title: Playdate Reviews are in! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.18.22
description:
PlayDate Reviews are in and Blessing and Janet are here to share theirs!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:09:38 - Housekeeping

KFW aka Kinda Funny Wrestling has a new home right here on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames. Episode 1 went up yesterday in case you missed it. Episode 2 follows today and then episode 3 records live on Twitch after KFGD and will be up tomorrow. So if you’ve missed out on KFW, you can catch up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.

SPEAKING OF KINDA FUNNY GAMES: A new Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now and Mike and Parris are joined by Chris Charla, the director of ID @ Xbox. They have a good conversation breaking down ID @ Xbox, you can catch that right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Pranksy, & Anonymous

The Roper Report  -
00:11:00 - PlayDate Review Round Up
00:37:08 - Ad
00:38:50 - Portal’s co-writer wants to make Portal 3 - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:47:05 - Ghost of Tsushima Appears to Have Received Its Final Planned Patch - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:52:32 - Shin Megami Tensei 5 Has Sold Over 1 Million Units Worldwide - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:54:52 - Future Xbox Games Might Have Ads - Zack Zweizen @ Kotaku
01:00:15 - Sonic Origins has been rated in South Korea - Chris Scullion @ VGC
01:01:15 - Babylon’s Fall dropped to less than 10 concurrent PC players this week - Andy Robinson @ VGC
01:04:22 - Netflix Announces a 'First-Of-Its-Kind' Deal With an Exploding Kittens Game and Animated Series - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
01:06:00 - Out today
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Whitta

  • KFW aka Kinda Funny Wrestling has a new home right here on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames. Episode 1 went up yesterday in case you missed it. Episode 2 follows today and then episode 3 records live on Twitch after KFGD and will be up tomorrow. So if you’ve missed out on KFW, you can catch up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
  • SPEAKING OF KINDA FUNNY GAMES: A new Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now and Mike and Parris are joined by Chris Charla, the director of ID @ Xbox. They have a good conversation breaking down ID @ Xbox, you can catch that right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
